installCommand: git lfs install && (git remote add origin https://github.com/mcapace/deutsch-hub.git 2>/dev/null || git remote set-url origin https://github.com/mcapace/deutsch-hub.git 2>/dev/null || true) && git config lfs.url https://github.com/mcapace/deutsch-hub.git/info/lfs && (git lfs pull || echo 'LFS pull failed, continuing...') && npm install
buildCommand: (git lfs pull || echo 'LFS pull failed, continuing build...') && npm run build
